name: Opus Clip
description: AI-powered video clipping tool that automatically creates short-form content from long videos. Features intelligent scene detection, automatic captioning, and viral moment identification for social media optimization.

name: ElevenLabs Voice Design
description: Advanced AI voice generation platform offering ultra-realistic text-to-speech, voice cloning, and voice design capabilities. Create custom voices with emotional range and multilingual support.

name: Pika Labs
description: AI video generation platform that transforms text and images into cinematic videos. Features include camera controls, style consistency, and professional-grade video editing capabilities.

name: Tome
description: AI-native presentation builder that creates stunning presentations from prompts. Combines generative AI with design intelligence to produce professional decks in minutes.

name: Playground AI
description: Professional AI image generation and editing platform with advanced controls. Features mixed image editing, style presets, and commercial-use licensing for creative professionals.

name: Krea AI
description: Real-time AI image generation tool with live canvas editing. Paint and see AI generate in real-time, perfect for concept art, design iteration, and creative exploration.

name: Magnific AI
description: AI-powered image upscaler and enhancer that adds incredible detail to images. Specializes in face enhancement, texture generation, and resolution enhancement up to 16x.

name: Vectorizer AI
description: Advanced AI tool that converts raster images to vector graphics with unprecedented accuracy. Perfect for logo design, illustration work, and print production.

name: Lexica Art
description: AI art generation platform with a massive searchable database of AI-generated images. Features custom model training and commercial licensing options.

name: Reka AI
description: Multimodal AI platform for understanding and generating content across text, images, video, and audio. Features advanced reasoning capabilities and API access for developers.

name: Cohere Command R
description: Enterprise-grade LLM optimized for retrieval augmented generation (RAG) and tool use. Features multilingual support and advanced reasoning for business applications.

name: Mistral Large
description: Cutting-edge large language model with exceptional reasoning capabilities and multilingual support. Offers both API access and on-premise deployment options.

name: Groq
description: Ultra-fast AI inference platform delivering LLM responses at unprecedented speeds. Powered by custom LPU chips for real-time AI applications.

name: Together AI
description: Platform for running, fine-tuning, and deploying open-source AI models at scale. Features model optimization and serverless GPU infrastructure.

name: Fireworks AI
description: Fast and affordable platform for deploying production AI applications. Specializes in low-latency inference and model optimization for enterprise use.
